coding_prompts.title: Basic Syntax and Understanding
coding_prompts.prompt: Write a Python function that takes a list of numbers and returns the sum of the even numbers in the list.

coding_prompts.title: Problem-Solving
coding_prompts.prompt: Write a Python function to check if a given string is a palindrome.

coding_prompts.title: Code Optimization
Error Handling
coding_prompts.prompt: Write a Python function that reads a file and returns its content. Ensure the function handles file not found errors gracefully.

coding_prompts.title: Algorithm Implementation
coding_prompts.prompt: Implement the quicksort algorithm in Python.

coding_prompts.title: Data Structures
coding_prompts.prompt: Write a Python class to implement a basic stack with push, pop, and peek methods.
